content.raw:
Ubuntu CI is looking better, except for 1 compiler warning and 1 cppcheck error that I made inline comments about

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia&build=784)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/784/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/784/
* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none&build=1032)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/1032/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/1032/

I don't see any unusual failures in the macOS or windows builds:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64&build=1663)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1663/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1663/
* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64&build=2455)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/2455/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/2455/
